content:
I completely understand! It's normal to feel overwhelmed when starting a new project, especially when there's so much information out there. But it's great that you're taking the first steps and doing your research.

It's fantastic that you've been listening to podcasts during your workouts and finding them motivating! That's exactly what podcasts are meant to do - inspire, educate, and entertain. And now, you're taking it to the next level by creating your own podcast!

Remember, starting a podcast is a process, and it's okay to take it one step at a time. You don't have to have all the answers right now. Just focus on taking small steps towards your goal, and you'll get there.

Keep listening to podcasts, learning from them, and getting inspired by the creatives you're interviewing. Your passion and enthusiasm will shine through in your podcast, and your audience will appreciate it.

If you ever need any guidance or just want to chat about your podcast, feel free to reach out to me anytime. I'm here to help.

Keep pushing forward, and most importantly, have fun with it!
